div.span: On this page you will find information that is frequently updated concerning the COVID-19/Corona Virus. read more about COVID-19/Coronavirus Information

Does your student need help with their iPad or MacBook? Always completely restart the device first. Tech support is available Monday - Friday 8:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Call 260-356-7812 x 8200. There is also helpful information on the Technology Help webpage. read more about Tech Help
Do you have questions, comments or concerns about HCCSC? E-mail them to Comments@hccsc.k12.in.us

div.div: HCCSC will be closed & continue remote learning th

HCCSC will be closed & continue remote learning through 5.28.2020. Please visit the HCCSC web page under Parents for the schedule of learning, additional information and FAQ. Please stay safe and well.

div.span: In Huntington County Community School Corporation, each student is promised
Lifelong Guidelines, LIFESKILLS, and a Secure Environment.

div.p: Huntington County Community School Corporation provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment.
